page.title: 08ABBOTSHOLME SCHOOL
page.content: The Headmaster is Mr.D.Farrant who has been at Abbotsholme for 12 months. The school day starts at 8-50 am.with Chapel. The Chapel itself has a marble statue of the 'Radiant lover' along one wall.The school day finishes at 6-40pm. and assignments begin after supper. One tradition that has survived from the days of Reddie,is the position of 'Redship'.This is a coveted title awarded to 5th formers in the school,whose behaviour and attitude are worthy of note.This usually leads to Prefectship being awarded in the 6th form.'Reds' are elected by Staff and Prefects through discussion,although the final decision rests with the Headmaster.Only 10 or so 'Reds' will be selected. Prefects are elected by Staff,6th formers and 'Reds'.
